doc:
Craig Kilborn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Craig_Kilborn 0 Craig Kilborn (born August 24, 1962) is an American comedian, sports and political commentator, actor, and television host. He was the first host of The Daily Show, a former anchor on ESPN's SportsCenter, and Tom Snyder's successor on CBS' The Late Late Show. On June 28, 2010, he launched The Kilborn File after a six-year absence from television. The Kilborn File aired on some Fox stations during a six-week trial run. In comedy, he is known for his deadpan delivery. Craig_Kilborn ( born August_24 , 1962 ) is an_American_comedian , sports and political_commentator , actor , and television_host . He was the_first_host of The_Daily_Show , a_former_anchor on ESPN 's_SportsCenter , and Tom_Snyder 's_successor on CBS '_The_Late_Late_Show . On June_28_,_2010 , he launched The_Kilborn_File after a_six-year_absence from television . The_Kilborn_File aired on some_Fox_stations during a_six-week_trial_run . In comedy , he is_known for his_deadpan_delivery .
